name: Customize & 3D Print Your Favorite Game Characters
blurb: Out of the screen and into your hands...customize and 3D print your favorite game characters with our web and mobile app!

rewards.reward: LONE WOLF AND CUB: Get exclusive, early access to the Sandboxr web app for yourself and a friend! Be among the first in the world to design custom creations with Sandboxr!

MOBILE LONE WOLF AND CUB: Get exclusive, early access to the Sandboxr web app AND the Sandboxr mobile app for yourself and a friend! Be among the first in the world to design custom creations anywhere, anytime with Sandboxr!

THE EXTRA LIVES PARTY PACK: Get exclusive, early access to the Sandboxr web app and the Sandboxr mobile app for yourself and 3 friends! Be among the first in the world to make custom creations  anywhere, anytime with Sandboxr!

THE WELLS PACK: Your custom creation 3D printed at 3 inches. Also includes: Priority 1 in our print queue, The Extra Lives Party Pack, and Free shipping within the US. Be among the first in the world to have your Sandboxr custom print delivered to your door!  (Package valued at $44.95)

THE ORWELL PACK: Your custom creation 3D printed at 3 inches. Also includes: Priority 2 in our print queue, The Extra Lives Party Pack, and Free Shipping in the US. Be among the first in the world to have your Sandboxr custom print delivered to your door! (Package valued at $44.95)

THE BRADBURY PACK: Your custom creation 3D printed at 3 inches. Also includes: Priority 3 in our print queue, The Extra Lives Party Pack, and Free Shipping in the US. Be among the first in the world to have your Sandboxr custom print delivered to your door! (Package valued at $44.95)
THE ASIMOV PACK: Your custom creation 3D printed at 3 inches. Also includes: The Extra Lives Party Pack and Free Shipping in the US. (Package valued at $44.95)

THE SUPERVILLAIN SPECIAL: Get the entire library of Supervillain Studios digital content to use in your creations, including games like \u201cTower Wars\u201d and \u201cOrder Up!\u201d\r\n\r\nAlso includes: Extra Lives Party Pack.

COMBO MEAL 1 (The Wells Pack + The Supervillain Special): Your custom creation 3D printed at 3 inches. Also includes: Priority 1 in our print queue, The Extra Lives Party Pack, the entire library of Supervillain Studios digital content to use in your creations, including games like "Tower Wars", "Order Up!!", etc., and Free Shipping within the US. (Package valued at $85.95)

COMBO MEAL 2 (The Orwell Pack + The Supervillain Special): Your custom creation 3D printed at 3 inches. Also includes: Priority 2 in our print queue, The Extra Lives Party Pack, the entire library of Supervillain Studios digital content to use in your creations, including games like "Tower Wars", "Order Up!!", etc., and Free Shipping within the US. (Package valued at $85.95)

COMBO MEAL 3 (The Bradbury Pack + The Supervillain Special): Your custom creation 3D printed at 3 inches. Also includes: Priority 3 in our print queue, The Extra Lives Party Pack, the entire library of Supervillain Studios digital content to use in your creations, including games like "Tower Wars", "Order Up!!", etc., and Free Shipping within the US. (Package valued at $85.95)

COMBO MEAL 4 (The Azimov Pack + The Supervillain Special): Your custom creation 3D printed at 3 inches. Also includes: The Extra Lives Party Pack, the entire library of Supervillain Studios digital content to use in your creations, including games like "Tower Wars", "Order Up!!", etc., and Free Shipping within the US. (Package valued at $85.95)

SANDBOXR EXPORTR:  For one year, when you create with Sandboxr, you can EXPORT your file in a standard 3D printing format (STL or similar, up to 20 free exports per month) -so you can print it until your heart\u2019s content on your own desktop 3D printer (some restrictions apply).

SANDBOXR BFF: Get three separate custom 3D prints at the 3\u201d size, The Extra Lives Party Pack, and Priority 1 for Life! Whenever you print with Sandboxr, you get to \u201ccut in line\u201d in the print queue and your creations will be printed within 2 weeks of placing your order! Also Includes: Neon Sandboxr friendship bracelet! because we are best friends forever! (Retail value: \u2026priceless!)

POW PACK: Here\u2019s your chance to get guaranteed access to any and all of the digital content that is brought into the Sandboxr platform for the next 12 months. That\u2019s right, anything that is already for sale in our library AND anything that will be for sale in our library in the next 12 months is at your mercy! Think of the possibilities! Also includes: Extra Lives Party Pack, Sandboxr BFF.

FEATURED BRAND PACK: We will feature your content in the forefront of the user shopping experience to showcase your artwork. For one week your content will be prominently displayed in the featured category of our \u201cFind Parts\u201d screen within our web UI and our app, tempting users to give into the glory of your artwork and make it their own. Week selection will be first come first serve, beginning the week of July 1st 2013. Also includes: Extra Lives Party Pack, Sandboxr BFF.

GEPPETTO: You get to work with our team of talented 3D artists to create your very own character.  Make your vision come to life in your own fully rigged and animated character. Pose, mix, morph, and blend your character as you see fit.  This character is all yours.  You own the digital rights to it and can sell it on your Sandboxr storefront. Also includes: Extra Lives Party Pack, Sandboxr BFF, and $500 Sandboxr credit towards future purchases and prints.
